text: Kiss the Boys Goodbye is a 1941 American musical movie directed by Victor Schertzinger and was based on the play of the same name by Clare Boothe Luce. It stars Mary Martin, Don Ameche, Oscar Levant, Virginia Dale, Jerome Cowan and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1941 movies Category:1940s American musical movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Victor Schertzinger Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Kiss the Boys Goodbye
